title: Create paranormal investigating website

requirements.text: Create a home page that introduces the paranormal investigation service with sections for: hero introduction, about the investigation team, services offered, and contact information
acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays a compelling hero section introducing paranormal investigation services
About section describes the investigation team and their expertise
Services section lists different types of paranormal investigations offered
Contact section provides ways to reach the investigation team

requirements.text: Implement a case submission form where users can report paranormal activity including fields for: location, type of phenomena, description of events, contact details, and optional photo upload capability
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes required fields for location, phenomena type, event description, and contact information
Form validates all required fields before submission
Users can optionally upload photos of paranormal evidence
Form submissions are stored in the backend
Users receive confirmation after successful submission

requirements.text: Create a case gallery page displaying submitted paranormal cases with filtering options by phenomena type (e.g., apparitions, unexplained sounds, objects moving, electromagnetic anomalies) and location
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays all submitted cases in a grid or list layout
Each case shows: title, location, phenomena type, brief description, and date
Users can filter cases by phenomena type
Users can filter cases by location
Clicking a case opens detailed view with full description and photos

requirements.text: Build backend data models and storage for paranormal cases including: case ID, submission timestamp, location, phenomena type, description, reporter contact information, investigation status, and associated photo references
acceptanceCriteria: Backend defines Motoko types for paranormal cases with all specified fields
Cases are stored in stable storage to persist across upgrades
Backend provides query methods to retrieve cases with filtering
Backend provides update methods to change investigation status
Case IDs are unique and automatically generated

requirements.text: Create an investigation resources page with information about: types of paranormal phenomena, investigation equipment and methods, evidence documentation guidelines, and safety precautions
acceptanceCriteria: Resources page is organized into clear sections with navigation
Page describes different types of paranormal phenomena with examples
Page lists common investigation equipment and their purposes
Page provides guidelines for documenting evidence
Page includes safety tips for paranormal investigations

requirements.text: Apply a mysterious, atmospheric visual design with a dark color scheme using deep purples, midnight blues, and ethereal greens, combined with vintage investigation aesthetics including distressed textures, ghostly typography, and subtle animated effects that evoke the paranormal theme
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses dark, moody colors (deep purples, midnight blues, ethereal greens)
Typography has a vintage or mysterious character appropriate for paranormal investigation
UI includes subtle atmospheric effects like shadows, glows, or gentle animations
Overall aesthetic balances professionalism with supernatural mystery
Design is consistent across all pages

requirements.text: Render generated images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated including the paranormal investigation hero background and investigation team logo
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Hero background image is displayed on the home page
Investigation team logo is displayed in the header/navigation
Images load correctly and enhance the paranormal theme

constraints: Must use single-actor Motoko backend architecture
Frontend must use React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn UI components
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Integration with external paranormal databases or APIs

required: Atmospheric paranormal investigation hero background with misty, moonlit abandoned building and mysterious shadows (hero-paranormal.dim_1920x1080.png)
Vintage-style paranormal investigation team badge logo with ethereal elements and classic detective aesthetics (logo-investigation-team.dim_256x256.png)
